info.title: Your Pet app API
info.description: Documentation for server requests and responses of the Your Pet app. An app for posting pet notices about selling, lost pets, and pets available for adoption.

news.title: New York Bans Pet Stores From Selling Dogs, Cats and Rabbits
news.text: The ban, which takes effect in December 2024, is meant to prevent the sale of animals raised by commercial breeders accused of keeping them in inhumane conditions.

news.title: Pet Dogs and Cats
news.text: Erica Hsiung Wojcik opens our solving weekend.
